title: Dune
author: frank-herbert
summary: Set on the desert planet Arrakis, the story follows Paul Atreides as his family takes control of the planet and its valuable spice. Winner of the Hugo and Nebula awards, it is the best-selling science fiction novel of all time.

attribution.note: Book data from Open Library (openlibrary.org), part of Internet Archive.

description:
Set on the desert planet Arrakis, Dune is the story of the boy Paul Atreides, heir to a noble family tasked with ruling an inhospitable world where the only thing of value is the "spice" melange, a drug capable of extending life and enhancing consciousness. Coveted across the known universe, melange is a prize worth killing for...

When House Atreides is betrayed, the destruction of Paul's family will set the boy on a journey toward a destiny greater than he could ever have imagined. And as he...
